page.title: 19THE PRANCING HORSES GARAGE
page.content: The Prancing Horses is next door to Woodvale Motor Group.The man we interviewed owns both garages.They try and sell high performance cars (sports cars).They sell on average 4 cars a month.The most expensive car costs 26,000 pounds and the model is the Lotus Turbo Esprit.Inside it is full of leather and looks like a bed inside.There are 2 buildings, one is a showroom and the other is a workshop. They mostly sell Lotus and Ferrari with a few other cars like Porsches. The buildings are mostly made of glass The showrooms are carpeted.There are about 7 cars in the showroom and 4 in the workshop being mended.
